Posts.Content: May 22, 2014 10:35AM cego wrote: If you have Fibroadenoma, then you most likely have fibrocystic breasts which is very common and can cause your breasts to swell and be painful in the second part of your cycle.  However, if you feel a hard bump, or any new bump, then it is essential to get it checked. You are not paranoid, you are careful, and it's the right thing to do. If it's nothing then you will feel better, if it's something you'll be glad to have found it early. Good luck!
Posts.Title: worried about the pain in my breast amandaglick30 Young_Ignored
